lead_paragraph: The former Indy 500 winner Buddy Lazier will drive for the Hemelgarn Johnson team in a bid for his 16th start at Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Lazier, who won the 1996 Indy 500 with the car owner Ron Hemelgarn, has not driven in the I.R.L. since he finished 19th at Indianapolis last year for Sam Schmidt Motorsports, his only race of the season.
